Reviews.Title: “Everything we needed”

Reviews.Content: budget experience living venice close canals walking distance st marks square lot research found hotelso glad quiet comfortable clean warm february plenty hot water showerand exactly loved riotous red gold decor soft padded walls receptionists bel hotel friendly helpful receptionists domus looked quickly called home breakfast nice holiday definitely

Reviews.Title: “Switch from Domus Cavanis to Hotel Belle Arti without extra charges”
Reviews.Author: Naomisan_HU
Reviews.Content: booked paid nonrefundable double domus via agoda season christmas time domus hotel overbooked sister hotel hotel belle extra payment charge please note book hotel price include local tourist tax paid arrival reception hotel belle checkin domus pretends super busy staff provide tourist information extended level minimum start questions nice attitude theirs advise force receiving answer touristic questions plus info dining buy book look tourist info center breakfast domus hotel arranged hotel belle found true type food morning ham cheese bread cakes yoghurt muesli coffee tea juices etc volume quality perfect location domus hotel belle simply excellent vaporetto eg 1 stops academia left immediately appr 1 min walk flat street arrive checkin desk weve seen sooo people struggling huge luggages wheels throught steps bridges inner city location visiting city san marco square main tourist attractions close appr 510 min walk distance price domus hotel unbeatable venice highly recommend hotel chain

Reviews.Title: “good value for the price”
Reviews.Author: patkosvero
Reviews.Content: domus normal special ok perfect location cleanliness heating hot water nice breakfast silence dont noisy neighbours example checkin breakfast hotel near domus cant staff simple stay arent lowbudget traveller perfect liked

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Terrible Room”
Reviews.Author: SherrieARC
Reviews.Content: spend 200 american dollars cheap venice dont mind teenytiny bathroomshower pillows seen air conditioning location terrific admit reason booked reasonably priced 300 night hotels location clean tolerant situation air conditioning check fan blowing insisted 85 degrees bed soft pillows flat blanket itchy throw floor anyway apparently breakfast included tell mad morning left

Reviews.Title: “Probably best Value for Money in Venice; staying in Dorsoduro is an Experience on its Own”
Reviews.Author: brandeis2012
Reviews.Content: highly highly recommend domus looking budget comfortable accommodations venice 1star pensione facilities amenities 3star lobby breakfast delicious unlimited espressos yum rest actually 3star hotel belle 10 steps front domus impeccably clean quiet night view nice internal courtyard building hotel welllocated venetian dorsoduro 30second walk accademia accademia bridge 5min walk peggy guggenheim 10min walk st marks doges palace 1520 min walk rialto bridge jewish ghetto hey venice fun walking narrow winding streets yourself favor stay tourists venice genuinely venetian experience domus dorsoduro afternoons local students pouring schools universities italian grannies taking grandchildren stroll

Reviews.Title: “torturous experience”
Reviews.Author: raoarchie
Reviews.Content: hotel pathetic ones booked quadruple instructions 4 beds bunks child sized bunk beds husband travlling 60 aged parents nightmare hotel single handedly ruined mine parents experience venice 1130 pm check realized bunk beds sorry meaning somehow spent night extremely travel morning complained manager receptionist rude tried discount demeaning manner complaining discount downright racist wouldnt recommend close pleasant experience venice

Reviews.Content: stayed domus march price payed 40 euro night excellent value venice stay arrived belle arte check ready sat lovely garden belle arte talking couple demanded moved domus absolutely freezing feeling bit wary basic pay time check bit apprehensive true reception bar manned stairwell little derelict 2nd floor lift pleasantly surprised huge lovely warm cold venice spotlessly clean 70s looking furniture bed settee looking courtyard quiet bathroom size clean warm connecting door surprise suite roomseven larger double bed bathroom impressed 2nd bathroom handy breakfast staff belle arte pleasant compaints apart coffee italy terrible true lady charge coffee machine likes plenty cereal meat cheese salami cakes yoghurt croissants limited 2 placed table sight brought overall enjoyed stay reasonable price recommend stay perfect location near zattere stops easy stops 1st left via antonio form zattere church corner ate nights enjoyed
